item.title: Now Generating URL Slugs With Natural Language Processing!
item.description: Learn how to generate clean, SEO-friendly URL slugs using spaCy's natural language processing capabilities in this detailed guide.

item.title: Safe Storage of App Secrets in Python Development
item.description: Discover an effective method for securely storing and managing sensitive app secrets in Python development.

item.title: Automate All The Things: A Manifesto for Building Better Teams
item.description: Explore how automation can transform team dynamics, boost productivity, and foster innovation. This manifesto outlines the benefits of automating repetitive tasks to free up creative energy and improve collaboration across teams.

item.title: Preserve commit history when moving files across Git repositories
item.description: Learn how to preserve your commit history when moving files between Git repositories, ensuring that valuable project history and context are retained during the transfer process.

item.title: Publishing a Jekyll site to a separate Github Pages repository using Github Actions
item.description: Learn how to automate the deployment of your Jekyll site to a separate GitHub Pages repository using GitHub Actions, streamlining your workflow and ensuring seamless updates.

item.title: Writing a Novel with Visual Studio Code
item.description: Discover how to use Visual Studio Code as a powerful tool for writing and organising your novel, with tips to enhance your creative writing process.

item.title: Installing the NewRelic .NET agent on an Alpine Docker image
item.description: Learn how to install the New Relic .NET agent on an Alpine-based Docker image, with step-by-step instructions for monitoring your .NET applications in a lightweight container environment.

item.title: An implementation of the Capital Controls kata in Python
item.description: A walkthrough of the Capital Controls Kata in Python. Train of thought and a retrospective.

item.title: Trigger validation of a dropdown box when tabbing over it in KnockoutJS
item.description: When tabbing over a dropdown box in a form, it's tougher to trigger its validations than it is with empty text boxes. Here's a trick on how to enable that.

item.title: The Capital Controls Kata
item.description: A code kata to explore adaptation in changing system requirements.
